title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Free Shuttle - "Dune Buggy"
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Free Shuttle - "Dune Buggy"              Dune Buggy Beach Shuttle              Enjoy a Green Shuttle around Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore. Skip the hassle of full parking lots and help reduce carbon emissions by taking a free park shuttle from the South Shore Railroad. Our two, 16-passenger shuttle vans are fully accessible with a wheelchair ramp. They operate on weekends and holidays from Memorial Day weekend through Labor Day. Bonus, this is FREE!    Hours: 10am - 6:30pm  Shuttle runs every 20 - 30 mins   West Park Route Stop Locations: - Miller Train Station  - Douglas Center  - Lake Street Beach  - Marquette Park   Call 219-395-1821 for more information.        West Park Map
